name: fnd-card
description: Card layout which supports user image, title and subtitle. Optional actions and back facet.

keyAttribute.description: Primary key attribute value to be passed when card title is clicked

imagePosition.description: Image can be added in the header section, content section or at top as banner.

theme.description: Card theme i.e. dark/light. Default is dark

size.description: Dimension of the card. Valid values are small, medium and large

titleClickable.description: Title link flag i.e. true, false. True will make title a link

renderActionsMenu.description: Whether to show the orange actions menu icon. Default is false.

cardTitleClicked.description: Event to be dispatched when card title is clicked

keyAttribute.description: parameter to be passed with cardTitleClicked event

cardContextualActions.description: Event to be dispatched when card context actions icon is clicked

keyAttribute.description: Key attribute value for the card

alignId.description: ID of the element wrt which the PCA popup would be aligned

cardActionsMenuEvent.description: Event to be raised when actions menu orange icon is clicked

alignId.description: ID of the element wrt which the PCA would be aligned
